Name: Roman Highball
Ingredients: 50 ml Thomas Henry Soda Water chilled
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Highball (max 10oz/300ml) glass .
Prepare skewered crystallised ginger for garnish.
Review: Refreshing and Pimm's Cup -like. A great long drink to come home to.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Danny Gil at Weather Up, New York City, USA. Information on Highball cocktails , their history and tips on the perfect serve can be found on our page.
Nutrition: One serving of Roman Highball contains 219 calories
